subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
Found in page 164 of {{lang|zh|《佛教難字字典》}} published in 1988.<!-- Refer Page 180 of https://ctext.org/library.pl?if=gb&res=2483140 --> The dictionary lists Japanese [[shinjitai]] forms of frequently used characters in Buddhist texts as {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant forms}} in the main text.

This character is not found in any historical texts.
